markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skyseeker](/Feats.aspx?ID=2201) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 225, [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Jalmeri Heavenseeker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=198)

**Prerequisites**
[Sky and Heaven Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2200)

**Requirements**
You are in Sky and Heaven Stance.

</column>

---

You [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) toward an opponent. At any point in the Leap, you can make a single Strike against a creature within your reach. At 12th level, if you hit with this Strike, instead of finishing your Leap, you can immediately attempt a second Leap from the space where you struck the target of your Strike. You can make a single Strike against a target within your reach during this second Leap as well. At 16th level, you can attempt a third Leap if your second Strike hits, and you can attack a target at any point during this third Leap. All Leaps made during this activity gain a +10-foot status bonus to the total height or distance of your leap, and no two Strikes can target the same creature.
name: Skyseeker
requirement: You are in Sky and Heaven Stance.
requirement_markdown: You are in Sky and Heaven Stance.

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 225</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Sky and Heaven Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2200)

<summary>
You Leap toward an opponent.
</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 8" pfs="Standard" > Skyseeker Two Actions Source Impossible Lands pg. 225, Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under pg. 79 Archetype Jalmeri Heavenseeker Prerequisites Sky and Heaven Stance Requirements You are in Sky and Heaven Stance. --- You Leap toward an opponent. At any point in the Leap, you can make a single Strike against a creature within your reach. At 12th level, if you hit with this Strike, instead of finishing your Leap, you can immediately attempt a second Leap from the space where you struck the target of your Strike. You can make a single Strike against a target within your reach during this second Leap as well. At 16th level, you can attempt a third Leap if your second Strike hits, and you can attack a target at any point during this third Leap. All Leaps made during this activity gain a +10-foot status bonus to the total height or distance of your leap, and no two Strikes can target the same creature.
